title: Реванш
overview: The main character is a talented and ambitious Valentina, who dreams of achieving success in science. However, her life turns upside down when she finds herself caught in the center of dangerous intrigues. On the eve of her 23rd birthday, Valentina faces betrayal by people she trusted. A close person fabricates accusations against her, causing her to lose everything: her fiancé, her family home, and the trust of those around her. Valentina embarks on a relentless struggle for justice and love, realizing that the most important thing along the way is not to lose her humanity.
